We believe great products come from understanding the Job a person is hiring a product or service to do.

Our experience in trying to unlock innovation in the products and serviced we created lead us to Jobs-to-be-Done theory. We found the approach offers better more targeted insight into people struggles. This open up the potential for better solutions and product success. We want to share what we've learned.
- Dave and Greg

Contact Us

David Herse

Greg Le Sueur

Lessons from industry professionals

Dave and Greg have a combined experience of over 15 years in product development. Using their practical industry experience of Jobs-to-be-Done, they’ll take you step-by-step on how to turn your Jobs-to-be-Done interviews into successful products.

100% money back guarantee. If this does not help you create better products, we’ll give you your money back.
